verses.verse: וַנֵּ֣פֶן <S%H6437><s%> Then we turned וַנַּ֔עַל <S%H5927><s%> and went up דֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the way הַבָּשָׁ֑ן <S%H1316><s%> to Bashan וַיֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> came out עוֹג֩ <S%H5747><s%> and Og מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king הַבָּשָׁ֨ן <S%H1316><s%> of Bashan לִקְרָאתֵ֜נוּ <S%H7125><s%> against ה֧וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עַמּ֛וֹ <S%H5971><s%> us he and all his people לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> to battle אֶדְרֶֽעִי׃ <S%H154><s%> at Edrei

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> about אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָ֣א <S%H3372><s%> unto me Fear אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> into בְיָדְךָ֞ <S%H3027><s%> into thy hand נָתַ֧תִּי <S%H5414><s%> him not for I will deliver אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עַמּ֖וֹ <S%H5971><s%> him and all his people וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַרְצ֑וֹ <S%H776><s%> and his land וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> and thou shalt do לּ֔וֹ כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who עָשִׂ֗יתָ <S%H6213><s%> unto him as thou didst לְסִיחֹן֙ <S%H5511><s%> unto Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> which dwelt בְּחֶשְׁבּֽוֹן׃ <S%H2809><s%> at Heshbon

וַיִּתֵּן֩ <S%H5414><s%> delivered יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> So the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֜ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God בְּיָדֵ֗נוּ <S%H3027><s%> into our hands גַּ֛ם <S%H1571><s%> also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ע֥וֹג <S%H5747><s%> Og מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> also the king הַבָּשָׁ֖ן <S%H1316><s%> of Bashan וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> and all his people וַנַּכֵּ֕הוּ <S%H5221><s%> and we smote עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בִּלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> no הִשְׁאִֽיר־ <S%H7604><s%> him until none was left ל֖וֹ שָׂרִֽיד׃ <S%H8300><s%> to him remaining

וַנִּלְכֹּ֤ד <S%H3920><s%> And we took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עָרָיו֙ <S%H5892><s%> all his cities בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> at that time הַהִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> he לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not הָֽיְתָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become קִרְיָ֔ה <S%H7151><s%> there was not a city אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not לָקַ֖חְנוּ <S%H3947><s%> which we took מֵֽאִתָּ֑ם <S%H853><s%> שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <S%H8346><s%> not from them threescore עִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> cities כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֶ֣בֶל <S%H2256><s%> all the region אַרְגֹּ֔ב <S%H709><s%> of Argob מַמְלֶ֥כֶת <S%H4467><s%> the kingdom ע֖וֹג <S%H5747><s%> of Og בַּבָּשָֽׁן׃ <S%H1316><s%> in Bashan

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אֵ֜לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these עָרִ֧ים <S%H5892><s%> All these cities בְּצֻר֛וֹת <S%H1219><s%> [were] fenced חוֹמָ֥ה <S%H2346><s%> walls גְבֹהָ֖ה <S%H1364><s%> with high דְּלָתַ֣יִם <S%H1817><s%> gates וּבְרִ֑יחַ <S%H1280><s%> and bars לְבַ֛ד <S%H905><s%> alone מֵעָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> towns הַפְּרָזִ֖י <S%H6521><s%> beside unwalled הַרְבֵּ֥ה <S%H7235><s%> many מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> a great

וַנַּחֲרֵ֣ם <S%H2763><s%> And we utterly destroyed אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> them עָשִׂ֔ינוּ <S%H6213><s%> them as we did לְסִיחֹ֖ן <S%H5511><s%> unto Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king חֶשְׁבּ֑וֹן <S%H2809><s%> of Heshbon הַחֲרֵם֙ <S%H2763><s%> utterly destroying כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of every עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> of every city מְתִ֔ם <S%H4962><s%> the men הַנָּשִׁ֖ים <S%H802><s%> women וְהַטָּֽף׃ <S%H2945><s%> and children
וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַבְּהֵמָ֛ה <S%H929><s%> But all the cattle וּשְׁלַ֥ל <S%H7998><s%> and the spoil הֶעָרִ֖ים <S%H5892><s%> of the cities בַּזּ֥וֹנוּ <S%H962><s%> we took for a prey לָֽנוּ׃

וַנִּקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> out בָּעֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> at that time הַהִוא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land מִיַּ֗ד <S%H3027><s%> of the hand שְׁנֵי֙ <S%H8147><s%> of the two מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> kings הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּעֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> that [was] on this side הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan מִנַּ֥חַל <S%H5158><s%> from the river אַרְנֹ֖ן <S%H769><s%> of Arnon עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> unto mount חֶרְמֽוֹן׃ <S%H2768><s%> Hermon

צִידֹנִ֛ים <S%H6722><s%> the Sidonians יִקְרְא֥וּ <S%H7121><s%> call לְחֶרְמ֖וֹן <S%H2768><s%> ([Which] Hermon שִׂרְיֹ֑ן <S%H8303><s%> Sirion וְהָ֣אֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> and the Amorites יִקְרְאוּ־ <S%H7121><s%> call ל֖וֹ שְׂנִֽיר׃ <S%H8149><s%> Senir

כֹּ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> all עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> All the cities הַמִּישֹׁ֗ר <S%H4334><s%> of the plain וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַגִּלְעָד֙ <S%H1568><s%> and all Gilead וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַבָּשָׁ֔ן <S%H1316><s%> and all Bashan עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far סַלְכָ֖ה <S%H5548><s%> unto Salchah וְאֶדְרֶ֑עִי <S%H154><s%> and Edrei עָרֵ֛י <S%H5892><s%> cities מַמְלֶ֥כֶת <S%H4467><s%> of the kingdom ע֖וֹג <S%H5747><s%> of Og בַּבָּשָֽׁן׃ <S%H1316><s%> in Bashan

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for רַק־ <S%H7535><s%> but ע֞וֹג <S%H5747><s%> For only Og מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king הַבָּשָׁ֗ן <S%H1316><s%> of Bashan נִשְׁאַר֮ <S%H7604><s%> remained מִיֶּ֣תֶר <S%H3499><s%> of the remnant הָרְפָאִים֒ <S%H7497><s%> of giants הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold עַרְשׂוֹ֙ <S%H6210><s%> behold his bedstead עֶ֣רֶשׂ <S%H6210><s%> [was] a bedstead בַּרְזֶ֔ל <S%H1270><s%> of iron הֲלֹ֣ה <S%H3808><s%> [is] it not הִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> he בְּרַבַּ֖ת <S%H7237><s%> in Rabbath בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַמּ֑וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon תֵּ֧שַׁע <S%H8672><s%> was nine אַמּ֣וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits אָרְכָּ֗הּ <S%H753><s%> [was] the length וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> thereof and four אַמּ֛וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits רָחְבָּ֖הּ <S%H7341><s%> the breadth בְּאַמַּת־ <S%H520><s%> of it after the cubit אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> of a man

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֧רֶץ <S%H776><s%> And this land הַזֹּ֛את <S%H2063><s%> we יָרַ֖שְׁנוּ <S%H3423><s%> [which] we possessed בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> at that time הַהִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> he מֵעֲרֹעֵ֞ר <S%H6177><s%> from Aroer אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is by נַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> which [is] by the river אַרְנֹ֗ן <S%H769><s%> Arnon וַחֲצִ֤י <S%H2677><s%> and half הַֽר־ <S%H2022><s%> mount הַגִּלְעָד֙ <S%H1568><s%> Gilead וְעָרָ֔יו <S%H5892><s%> and the cities נָתַ֕תִּי <S%H5414><s%> thereof gave לָרֻֽאוּבֵנִ֖י <S%H7206><s%> I unto the Reubenites וְלַגָּדִֽי׃ <S%H1425><s%> and to the Gadites

וְיֶ֨תֶר <S%H3499><s%> And the rest הַגִּלְעָ֤ד <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַבָּשָׁן֙ <S%H1316><s%> and all Bashan מַמְלֶ֣כֶת <S%H4467><s%> [being] the kingdom ע֔וֹג <S%H5747><s%> of Og נָתַ֕תִּי <S%H5414><s%> gave לַחֲצִ֖י <S%H2677><s%> I unto the half שֵׁ֣בֶט <S%H7626><s%> tribe הַֽמְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh כֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> all חֶ֤בֶל <S%H2256><s%> all the region הָֽאַרְגֹּב֙ <S%H709><s%> of Argob לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַבָּשָׁ֔ן <S%H1316><s%> with all Bashan הַה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> which יִקָּרֵ֖א <S%H7121><s%> was called אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land רְפָאִֽים׃ <S%H7497><s%> of giants

יָאִ֣יר <S%H2971><s%> Jair בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh לָקַח֙ <S%H3947><s%> took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֶ֣בֶל <S%H2256><s%> all the country אַרְגֹּ֔ב <S%H709><s%> of Argob עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> unto the coasts הַגְּשׁוּרִ֖י <S%H1651><s%> of Geshuri וְהַמַּֽעֲכָתִ֑י <S%H4602><s%> and Maachathi וַיִּקְרָא֩ <S%H7121><s%> and called אֹתָ֨ם <S%H853><s%> עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> after שְׁמ֤וֹ <S%H8034><s%> them after his own name אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבָּשָׁן֙ <S%H1316><s%> Bashan חַוֹּ֣ת יָאִ֔יר <S%H2334><s%> Havvoth-jair עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> far הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this
וּלְמָכִ֖יר <S%H4353><s%> unto Machir נָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> And I gave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> Gilead

וְלָרֻאוּבֵנִ֨י <S%H7206><s%> And unto the Reubenites וְלַגָּדִ֜י <S%H1425><s%> and unto the Gadites נָתַ֤תִּי <S%H5414><s%> I gave מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַגִּלְעָד֙ <S%H1568><s%> from Gilead וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far נַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> even unto the river אַרְנֹ֔ן <S%H769><s%> Arnon תּ֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> half הַנַּ֖חַל <S%H5158><s%> the valley וּגְבֻ֑ל <S%H1366><s%> and the border וְעַד֙ <S%H5704><s%> far יַבֹּ֣ק <S%H2999><s%> Jabbok הַנַּ֔חַל <S%H5158><s%> even unto the river גְּב֖וּל <S%H1366><s%> [which is] the border בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon

וְהָֽעֲרָבָ֖ה <S%H6160><s%> The plain וְהַיַּרְדֵּ֣ן <S%H3383><s%> also and Jordan וּגְבֻ֑ל <S%H1366><s%> and the coast מִכִּנֶּ֗רֶת <S%H3672><s%> [thereof] from Chinnereth וְעַ֨ד <S%H5704><s%> far יָ֤ם <S%H3220><s%> even unto the sea הָֽעֲרָבָה֙ <S%H6160><s%> of the plain יָ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> sea הַמֶּ֔לַח <S%H4417><s%> [even] the salt תַּ֛חַת <S%H8478><s%> the foot אַשְׁדֹּ֥ת <S%H794><s%> of the slopes הַפִּסְגָּ֖ה <S%H6449><s%> of Pisgah מִזְרָֽחָה׃ <S%H4217><s%> eastward

וָאֲצַ֣ו <S%H6680><s%> And I commanded אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> בָּעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> you at that time הַהִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> he לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H430><s%> your God נָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> hath given לָכֶ֜ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> you this land הַזֹּאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> likewise לְרִשְׁתָּ֔הּ <S%H3423><s%> to possess חֲלוּצִ֣ים <S%H2502><s%> armed תַּֽעַבְר֗וּ <S%H5674><s%> it ye shall pass over לִפְנֵ֛י <S%H6440><s%> before אֲחֵיכֶ֥ם <S%H251><s%> your brethren בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> all [that are] meet חָֽיִל׃ <S%H2428><s%> for the war

רַ֠ק <S%H7535><s%> But נְשֵׁיכֶ֣ם <S%H802><s%> But your wives וְטַפְּכֶם֮ <S%H2945><s%> and your little ones וּמִקְנֵכֶם֒ <S%H4735><s%> and your cattle יָדַ֕עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> ([for] I know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מִקְנֶ֥ה <S%H4735><s%> and your livestock רַ֖ב <S%H7227><s%> that ye have much לָכֶ֑ם יֵֽשְׁבוּ֙ <S%H3427><s%> in בְּעָ֣רֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5892><s%> in your cities אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֖תִּי <S%H5414><s%> which I have given לָכֶֽם׃
